function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of human-to-human transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus and increased infection rates","Mitigation":"Enforcing the use of face masks and implementing strict hygiene measures","Technologies":"Face mask detection systems, contactless payment systems","People":"Passengers, drivers, urban dwellers","Owner":"Transportation authorities, ride-sharing companies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Decline in low-carbon investments due to economic downturn","Impact":"Reduced development and implementation of low-carbon technologies and infrastructure","Mitigation":"Incentivizing private and public sector investments in low-carbon technologies, promoting government subsidies and tax incentives","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy-efficient infrastructure, carbon capture and storage","People":"Private sector investors, public sector entities","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations, renewable energy companies"}]}
